DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to make available an agent,Mesna, which can assist the surgeon during the procedure of capsulectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Chemically Assisted Capsulectomy-A New Clinical Approach
DOC.detailed_description: Mesna is a FDA approved drug for the treatment of respiratory diseases and is used a protective agent against drugs in oncology patients. It has also been used in Gynecologic surgery and ENT. Mesna is a drug that breaks down adhesions between tissue layers.
DOC.criteria: All females undergoing capsulectomy All pregnant women and nursing mothers will be exclued
DOC.keyword: Capsular contracture after breast implant placement
